description: The round payoff this round was 3. You, Kate chose to play option 1.John chose to play option 1. You received a payoff of 0.

The game has a symmetric payoff structure, meaning that both players receive the same payoff when they choose the same option, and the payoffs are determined by the combination of the players' actions
The round input plays a crucial role in determining the payoffs, especially when one or both players choose option 2, as it directly affects the magnitude of the payoffs
There is an element of risk and potential for high losses when choosing option 2, especially if the other player also chooses option 2, as the payoff is negative and multiplied by 1000
The game involves strategic decision-making, as each player must consider the potential actions of the other player and weigh the risks and benefits of choosing option 1 or option 2

The memory of past rounds, such as the one mentioned on 2024-01-02, can provide valuable information for making decisions in future rounds, as it reveals the actions taken by both players and the resulting payoffs
